description: PK. Unique transaction identifier. Format: T0, T1, …
FK → customers.customer_id. Denormalised for single-key joins.
FK → accounts.account_id. Account that initiated the payment.
FK → accounts.account_id. NULLABLE. Set for internal transfers only.
FK → beneficiaries.beneficiary_id. NULLABLE. Set for external transfers only.
FK → devices.device_id. Device used to initiate transaction.
Full datetime of transaction (UTC).
Transaction amount in INR. Lognormally distributed.
Channel: mobile | web | branch | atm.
Always 'debit' — sender perspective.
Payment instrument: UPI | IMPS | wallet_transfer | NEFT | RTGS | online_transfer | cash_deposit | cash_withdrawal | DD | balance_enquiry.
1 = physical cash involved (cash_deposit, cash_withdrawal, DD).
Ground truth typology: normal | mule_ring | layering | ATO | smurfing | identity_fraud.
Target variable. 0 = legitimate, 1 = fraud.
From accounts. Average account balance (INR). Denominator for ratio features.
From accounts. Days since account opened. <60 days = elevated identity fraud risk.
From accounts/customers. KYC depth: low | medium | high.
From accounts/customers. Home jurisdiction risk: low | medium | high.
From accounts/customers. Declared income: low | medium | high.
From accounts/customers. CDD rating: low | medium | high | very_high.
From accounts/customers. 1 = Politically Exposed Person.
From accounts/customers. Declared occupation.
From accounts/customers. Business sector.
From accounts/customers. Account type: retail | corporate | savings | current | business.
From devices. Age of device in days.
From devices. 1 = rooted/jailbroken device.
From devices. android | ios | windows | unknown.
From devices. 1 = VPN/proxy detected.
From devices. 1 = emulated environment (not physical device).
From beneficiaries. individual | merchant | crypto | offshore.
From beneficiaries. Jurisdiction risk: low | medium | high.
Hour of day (0–23). Fraud peaks at 0–4 and 20–23.
Day of week (0=Mon … 6=Sun).
Calendar date of transaction.
Calendar month (1–12).
ISO week number (1–53).
1 = transaction between 22:00 and 05:59.
1 = Saturday or Sunday.
1 = transaction between 09:00 and 17:00.
amount / avg_balance (clipped at 1). >1 means txn exceeds typical balance.
1 = amount is a round multiple of ₹1,000 and ≥ ₹1,000.
log1p(amount). Log-transformed for ML models.
1 = beneficiary_id is in the high-risk pool (crypto/offshore/high-country-risk).
Account age in days at the time of this transaction (dynamic, not static).
ACCOUNT: Number of transactions sent in the last 1 hour.
ACCOUNT: Number of transactions sent in the last 24 hours.
ACCOUNT: Total INR sent in the last 24 hours.
ACCOUNT: Transaction count in the last 7 days.
ACCOUNT: Transaction count in the last 30 days.
ACCOUNT: Total INR sent in the last 7 days.
ACCOUNT: Total INR sent in the last 30 days.
ACCOUNT: Z-score of this amount vs 30-day rolling mean. >3 = anomalous spike.
ACCOUNT: 1 = >30 days since last transaction from this account.
ACCOUNT: Cumulative count of all transactions from this account.
CUSTOMER: Transactions across all accounts in last 1 hour.
CUSTOMER: Transactions across all accounts in last 24 hours.
CUSTOMER: Total INR across all accounts in last 24 hours.
CUSTOMER: Transaction count across all accounts in last 7 days.
CUSTOMER: Total INR across all accounts in last 7 days.
CUSTOMER: Transaction count across all accounts in last 30 days.
CUSTOMER: Total INR across all accounts in last 30 days.
CUSTOMER: Number of unique accounts used (cumulative proxy).
Per-transaction IP. 70% home (stable, hash-derived), 20% roaming, 10% high-risk proxy. Always risk_ip when vpn_flag=1.
Float 0.0–1.0. Base: home=0.05, roam=0.30, risk=0.80. Modifiers: +0.15 vpn, +0.10 rooted/emulator/night each, +0.05 high-country-risk, −0.05 high-kyc. Capped [0,1].
Latitude of transaction origin. home_ip→home_lat±N(0,0.05°); roam_ip→Indian city±0.3°; risk_ip→global random.
Longitude of transaction origin. Same logic as geo_lat.
Chain/ring identifier. FLOW_00001… (mule_ring 0–9999, layering 10000+). NULL for ATO, smurfing, identity_fraud, dormant_* typologies.
Total hops in this flow (accounts_per_ring for mule_ring; chain_length for layering). NULL for non-flow typologies.
Position in flow: 1=origin, flow_depth=final. NULL for non-flow typologies.
Seconds from hop_number=1 to this transaction. 0 for origin hop. NULL for non-flow typologies.
Account balance immediately before this transaction. Initialised to avg_balance on first txn; carried forward as balance_after_txn thereafter. INR.
Account balance after this transaction = max(0, balance_before_txn + signed_amount). Clamped at 0. INR.
Alias for balance_after_txn. Post-transaction account balance. INR.
Signed amount applied to balance. −amount for debits, +amount for credits. Captures direction of balance change. INR.
Sum of signed_amounts for this account on the same calendar date up to this row. Resets at day boundary per account. INR.
Composite risk score 0–100. = min(0.5×weighted_rule_score + 0.3×label×10 + 0.2×min(amount_to_balance_ratio,10), 100). Bands: 0–20 very low, 21–40 low, 41–60 medium, 61–80 high, 81–100 critical.
Shared KYC document group (e.g. KYC_00042). NULL=unique identity. Non-NULL=multiple accounts share same KYC doc — synthetic identity / mule ring signal.
Shared phone number group. NULL=unique. Non-NULL=same phone across customers — mule recruitment / SIM-swap signal.
Shared email group. NULL=unique. Non-NULL=same email across customer records — identity farm signal.
Customer home city name. Seeds per-transaction geo coordinates.
Customer home city latitude. Jittered per transaction for home IPs.
Customer home city longitude. Jittered per transaction for home IPs.
Total AML rules triggered by this transaction. Higher = more suspicious.
Severity (1–3) of the most severe rule triggered. 0 if none.
Sum of severities of all triggered rules. Overall suspicion weight.
